title: Doping engineering of Cu-based catalysts for electrocatalytic CO2 reduction to multi-carbon products
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5795-5818
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01325E, Review Article
Shiya You, Jiewen Xiao, Shuyu Liang, Wenfu Xie, Tianyu Zhang, Min Li, Ziyi Zhong, Qiang Wang, Hong He
Recent developments in heteroatom-doped Cu-based catalysts for CO2 electroreduction into C2+ products are highlighted. The design strategies for doped catalysts and in situ technologies for CO2 electroreduction are discussed.
